actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend section 6 of the Colorado River Storage Act (70 Stat. 109).

summary.text: Amends the Colorado River Storage Act to change, from January 1 to May 1, the date by which the Secretary of the Interior must make the annual report to Congress concerning the status of the revenues from, and the cost of, constructing, operating, and maintaining the Colorado River storage project and the participating projects.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 6 of the Colorado River Storage Act (70 Stat. 109).
